entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Fog spreading inland. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow early in the evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 then light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 22 March 2023
